_description: Appeal of Christ to Man by the Pains of the Passion — six monorhyming quatrains

BLHar2316.First Lines: Men rent me on rodewiht wudes woliche wode…
BLHar2316.Last Lines: …Mak stif wiht stondingthenk wel who me rente on ȝe rode
BLHar2316.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.

Luria,  Maxwell Sidney,  and  Richard L. Hoffman, eds.  
             Middle English Lyrics.
